title: 96/254/EC: Commission Decision of 26 March 1996 amending Decision 94/448/EC laying down special conditions governing imports of fishery and aquaculture products originating in New Zealand (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 March 1996 amending Decision 94/448/EC laying down special conditions governing imports of fishery and aquaculture products originating in New Zealand (Text with EEA relevance) (96/254/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B of Decision 94/448/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 March 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 15.
(2) OJ No L 184, 20. 7. 1994, p. 16.
(3) OJ No L 9, 12. 1. 1996, p. 6.
(4) OJ No L 8, 11. 1. 1990, p. 70.
